name: Bubbles Pro - Match Dash Epic Puzzle Popper
name_original: Bubbles Pro - Match Dash Epic Puzzle Popper
description:
Bubble Match is an addictive game that any mobile user should have in their game collection.
Stuck endless Hints :)
Match up 3 bubbles and more buy drawing the entire row or column or just swap the bubble to match
try to get combo to increase you scour before time ends,
Add popups using your score
-----------------
Power Ups
-----------------
-Increase time
-Fireworks missiles
-Falling bubbles catch
-Double coins
-Shuffle
